1.content:
In the busy streets of the magical city Dalaran there is a small store located at the profession street. It’s been up and running ever since the rise of the Litch King but have been forced to close ever since the demons engaged the city. There’s so many new adventurers summoned by those mages. Maybe some new potential customers?~”

The gnome left the door open as she went back inside. Above the door was a bright glowing sign in neon lights spelling out “LILLY’S TINY PET STORE” Lilly sat down behind the counter eagerly waiting for customers and as she did she saw one of her merchandise roaming the floor seemingly having escaped its cage. It was a tiny blood elf standing around three inches tall. She had long red hair but other than that she was completely exposed. Lilly herself rarely enjoyed her own goods. After all the main thing that Interested her was profit. But... seeing the tiny elf walking aimlessly and confused on the cold wooden floor sent ideas flying through Lilly’s head. “Well... I should clean up before any guests arrive anyways...” Lilly jumped of her tall chair and landed right infront of the tiny elf whit a soft *thump* “are you lost little one? I just want to go home!” Lilly could feel her struggles and even see the outlines of the elf’s hands through her stomach. But it only made all of this so much better. Lilly gently rubbed her stomach as she jumped back up on her seat whit a faint blush on her cheek. “There there... now digest like the snack you are.” As she was talking to her stomach the bell connected to the door rang as a adventurer entered the store and the business side of Lilly immediately kicked in. “Hi and welcome to my little store! We have tinys in all races so just pick your favorite and I’ll say the price~”
